microsoft office

docxtemplater is a library to generate docx/pptx documents from a docx/pptx template. It can replace {placeholders} with data and also supports loops and conditions. The templates can be edited by non-programmers, for example your clients.
docxtemplater æ”¯æŒnode.jsç«¯å’Œæµè§ˆå™¨ç«¯æ ¹æ®wordæ–‡ä»¶æ¨¡æ¿æ›¿æ¢{placeholders}å½¢å¼çš„å ä½ç¬¦ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„wordæ–‡ä»¶, pptäº¦åŒ
npm : https://www.npmjs.com/package/docxtemplater
github : https://github.com/open-xml-templating/docxtemplater
ç½‘å€1: https://docxtemplater.com/
document: https://docxtemplater.readthedocs.io/en/latest/generate.html
docxtemplateræºä»£ç 

nodejsç«¯å…ˆå®‰è£…
cnpm install --save docxtemplater pizzip
ç¼–å†™wordæ¨¡æ¿æ–‡æ¡£, æ‰“å¼€wordè¾“å…¥å†…å®¹, å¹¶è®¾ç½®å¥½æ ¼å¼, å¦‚å›¾:

å…¶ä¸­çš„{name}æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå ä½ç¬¦, å ä½ç¬¦çš„åç§°æ˜¯"name", åé¢ç”Ÿæˆçš„æ–‡ä»¶{name}ä¼šè¢«æ•´ä¸ªæ›¿æ¢, {value}ç›¸ä¼¼
ç¼–å†™ä»£ç :
const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

const PizZip = require('pizzip');
const Docxtemplater = require('docxtemplater');

try {
let content = fs.readFileSync('./test.docx');

const zip_i = new PizZip(content);

let doc = new Docxtemplater(zip_i);
doc.setData({
name : 'æµ‹è¯•ç”¨åç§°',
value : 'test value'
});
doc.render();
const zip_o = doc.getZip();
const buf = zip_o.generate({
type : 'nodebuffer'
});
fs.writeFileSync('./output.docx', buf);
} catch (e) {
console.log(e);
}
